column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This place is amazing. I went with a lifelong Illinois resident on his first trip. We did all the pieces from Ferris Bueller
column2: then wandered all over the place. Love the impressionist room and the special exhibit on Danish serveware. If you're a student
column3: remember to bring your ID to get a discount. I was very impressed with their small cafeteria
column4: I had the chicago style dog with french fries
column5: and Â the dish was very good and very reasonably priced. A great place to reflect on your own
column6: to talk about art with a friend
column7: or a fun place as a possible date.
